name: Home Alone Girlfriend
description:
Have you ever experienced those moments when everything is just against you? Well, this is exactly it. Damned traffic. Instead of driving on a free road - as it is supposed to be in the middle of the night - you have to pretty much fight for your chance to get to your... well, "destination". But we all know what receiving such message means. That’s totally worth it.

The rules are simple. Get to the target and achieve your "goal" as fast as possible avoiding cars and collecting useful items.
Every minute counts. And so do the items you'd better to collect..Features:
  • classic running-game concept
  • nice thematic graphics
  • well-suited atmosphere
  • Steam Achievements
